title: jira_finding_life_cycle
description: The Veracode Integration for Jira and the Veracode Integration for Jira Cloud import findings to Jira or Jira Cloud as issues and maintain the status of those issues. The status is based on the configuration settings on the Administration page in Jira or Jira Cloud. The integration sometimes changes the status of issues and, consequently, adds a comment to the issue describing the reason for the action.

frontMatter.ft:title: Understanding the Finding Life Cycle in Jira
